name: Metafilter - Metafilter - Baby Blue (2009)
description: Style 3329 (by user 3710) has not been updated since 2007, and since that time, various new CSS elements appeared on Metafilter that are resultingly unstyled.  This is a hijack of user 3710's userstyle (until such time as he or she chooses to resume updates, if such time arrives) to keep it up to date with Metafilter's continued development.
